permissions.name: com.fsck.k9.permission.REMOTE_CONTROL
permissions.label: K-9 Mail remote control
permissions.description: Allows this application to control K-9 Mail activities and settings.

permissions.name: com.fsck.k9.permission.READ_MESSAGES
permissions.label: Read Emails
permissions.description: Allows this application to read your Emails.

permissions.name: com.fsck.k9.permission.DELETE_MESSAGES
permissions.label: Delete Emails
permissions.description: Allows this application to delete your Emails.

manifest:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<manifest xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:versionCode="27000" android:versionName="5.700-SNAPSHOT" package="com.fsck.k9" platformBuildVersionCode="27" platformBuildVersionName="8.1.0">
	<uses-sdk android:minSdkVersion="15" android:targetSdkVersion="22" />
	<uses-feature android:name="android.hardware.touchscreen" android:required="false" />
	<supports-screens android:anyDensity="true" android:smallScreens="true" android:normalScreens="true" android:largeScreens="true" />
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED" />
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.READ_CONTACTS" />
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.READ_SYNC_SETTINGS" />
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.WRITE_CONTACTS" />
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE" />
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET" />
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.VIBRATE" />
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.WAKE_LOCK" />
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" />
	<permission android:label="K-9 Mail remote control" android:name="com.fsck.k9.permission.REMOTE_CONTROL" android:protectionLevel="0x1" android:permissionGroup="android.permission-group.MESSAGES" android:description="Allows this application to control K-9 Mail activities and settings." />
	<uses-permission android:name="com.fsck.k9.permission.REMOTE_CONTROL" />
	<permission android:label="Read Emails" android:name="com.fsck.k9.permission.READ_MESSAGES" android:protectionLevel="0x1" android:permissionGroup="android.permission-group.MESSAGES" android:description="Allows this application to read your Emails." />
	<uses-permission android:name="com.fsck.k9.permission.READ_MESSAGES" />
	<permission android:label="Delete Emails" android:name="com.fsck.k9.permission.DELETE_MESSAGES" android:protectionLevel="0x1" android:permissionGroup="android.permission-group.MESSAGES" android:description="Allows this application to delete your Emails." />
	<uses-permission android:name="com.fsck.k9.permission.DELETE_MESSAGES" />
	<application android:theme="resourceId:0x7f090130" android:label="K-9 Mail" android:icon="res/drawable-mdpi-v4/icon.png" android:name="com.fsck.k9.K9" android:allowTaskReparenting="false" android:allowBackup="false" android:resizeableActivity="true">
		<meta-data android:name="android.app.default_searchable" android:value="com.fsck.k9.activity.Search" />
		<activity android:label="K-9 Mail" android:name="com.fsck.k9.activity.Accounts" android:launchMode="singleTop" android:configChanges="0x4" android:uiOptions="0x1">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" />
				<category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" />
				<category android:name="android.intent.category.LAUNCHER" />
			</intent-filter>
		</activity>
		<activity android:label="Settings" android:name="com.fsck.k9.activity.setup.Prefs" android:taskAffinity="com.fsck.k9.activity.setup.Prefs" android:excludeFromRecents="true" android:configChanges="0x4" />
		<activity android:label="Welcome to K-9 Mail" android:name="com.fsck.k9.activity.setup.WelcomeMessage" android:configChanges="0x4" />
		<activity android:theme="resourceId:0x7f090099" android:name="com.fsck.k9.activity.setup.OpenPgpAppSelectDialog" android:configChanges="0x4" />
		<activity android:label="Font size" android:name="com.fsck.k9.activity.setup.FontSizeSettings" android:configChanges="0x4" />
		<activity android:label="Set up a new account" android:name="com.fsck.k9.activity.setup.AccountSetupBasics" android:configChanges="0x4" />
		<activity android:label="Account type" android:name="com.fsck.k9.activity.setup.AccountSetupAccountType" android:configChanges="0x4" />
		<activity android:label="Incoming server settings" android:name="com.fsck.k9.activity.setup.AccountSetupIncoming" android:configChanges="0x4" />
		<activity android:label="Message composition options" android:name="com.fsck.k9.activity.setup.AccountSetupComposition" android:configChanges="0x4" />
		<activity android:label="Outgoing server settings" android:name="com.fsck.k9.activity.setup.AccountSetupOutgoing" android:configChanges="0x4" />
		<activity android:label="Account options" android:name="com.fsck.k9.activity.setup.AccountSetupOptions" android:configChanges="0x4" />
		<activity android:label="You're almost done!" android:name="com.fsck.k9.activity.setup.AccountSetupNames" android:configChanges="0x4" />
		<activity android:theme="resourceId:0x7f090131" android:label="Choose Account" android:name="com.fsck.k9.activity.ChooseAccount" android:configChanges="0x4" android:noHistory="true" />
		<activity android:theme="resourceId:0x7f090131" android:label="Choose Folder" android:name="com.fsck.k9.activity.ChooseFolder" android:configChanges="0x4" android:noHistory="true" />
		<activity android:theme="resourceId:0x7f090131" android:label="Choose identity" android:name="com.fsck.k9.activity.ChooseIdentity" android:configChanges="0x4" />
		<activity android:label="Manage identities" android:name="com.fsck.k9.activity.ManageIdentities" android:configChanges="0x4" />
		<activity android:label="Edit identity" android:name="com.fsck.k9.activity.EditIdentity" android:configChanges="0x4" />
		<activity android:theme="@android:style/Theme.Translucent.NoTitleBar" android:name="com.fsck.k9.activity.NotificationDeleteConfirmation" android:taskAffinity="" android:excludeFromRecents="true" android:launchMode="singleTop" />
		<activity android:label="" android:name="com.fsck.k9.activity.setup.AccountSetupCheckSettings" android:configChanges="0xa4" />
		<activity android:label="Account settings" android:name="com.fsck.k9.activity.setup.AccountSettings" android:configChanges="0x4" />
		<activity android:theme="@android:style/Theme.Dialog" android:label="Folder settings" android:name="com.fsck.k9.activity.setup.FolderSettings" android:configChanges="0x4" />
		<activity android:name="com.fsck.k9.activity.FolderList" android:configChanges="0x4" android:uiOptions="0x1">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" />
			</intent-filter>
		</activity>
		<activity android:name="com.fsck.k9.activity.MessageList" android:launchMode="singleTop" android:configChanges="0x4" android:uiOptions="0x1">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" />
			</intent-filter>
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.VIEW" />
				<data android:scheme="email" android:host="messages" />
				<category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" />
			</intent-filter>
		</activity>
		<activity android:label="K-9 Mail" android:name="com.fsck.k9.activity.MessageCompose" android:enabled="false" android:configChanges="0x4">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.SENDTO" />
				<data android:scheme="mailto" />
				<category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" />
			</intent-filter>
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.SEND" />
				<data android:mimeType="*/*" />
				<category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" />
			</intent-filter>
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.SEND_MULTIPLE" />
				<data android:mimeType="*/*" />
				<category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" />
			</intent-filter>
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.VIEW" />
				<data android:scheme="mailto" />
				<category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" />
				<category android:name="android.intent.category.BROWSABLE" />
			</intent-filter>
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="org.autocrypt.PEER_ACTION" />
				<category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" />
			</intent-filter>
			<meta-data android:name="android.service.chooser.chooser_target_service" android:value="com.fsck.k9.service.K9ChooserTargetService" />
		</activity>
		<activity android:label="Search" android:name="com.fsck.k9.activity.Search" android:configChanges="0x4" android:uiOptions="0x1">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.SEARCH" />
				<category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" />
			</intent-filter>
			<meta-data android:name="android.app.searchable" android:resource="res/xml/searchable.xml" />
		</activity>
		<activity android:label="K-9 Accounts" android:name="com.fsck.k9.activity.LauncherShortcuts" android:configChanges="0x4">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.CREATE_SHORTCUT" />
				<category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" />
			</intent-filter>
		</activity>
		<activity android:name="com.fsck.k9.activity.EmailAddressList" android:configChanges="0x4" />
		<activity android:name="com.fsck.k9.widget.unread.UnreadWidgetConfigurationActivity">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.appwidget.action.APPWIDGET_CONFIGURE" />
			</intent-filter>
		</activity>
		<activity android:label="Upgrading databases" android:name="com.fsck.k9.activity.UpgradeDatabases" />
		<activity android:label="Settings" android:name="com.fsck.k9.ui.settings.SettingsActivity" />
		<activity android:label="About" android:name="com.fsck.k9.ui.settings.AboutActivity" />
		<receiver android:name="com.fsck.k9.service.BootReceiver" android:enabled="true">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.BOOT_COMPLETED" />
			</intent-filter>
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.DEVICE_STORAGE_LOW" />
			</intent-filter>
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.DEVICE_STORAGE_OK" />
			</intent-filter>
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.net.conn.CONNECTIVITY_CHANGE" />
			</intent-filter>
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.net.conn.BACKGROUND_DATA_SETTING_CHANGED" />
			</intent-filter>
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="com.android.sync.SYNC_CONN_STATUS_CHANGED" />
			</intent-filter>
		</receiver>
		<receiver android:name="com.fsck.k9.service.RemoteControlReceiver" android:permission="com.fsck.k9.permission.REMOTE_CONTROL" android:enabled="true">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="com.fsck.k9.K9RemoteControl.set" />
			</intent-filter>
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="com.fsck.k9.K9RemoteControl.requestAccounts" />
			</intent-filter>
		</receiver>
		<receiver android:name="com.fsck.k9.service.CoreReceiver" android:exported="false" />
		<receiver android:name="com.fsck.k9.service.StorageReceiver" android:enabled="true">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.MEDIA_MOUNTED" />
				<data android:scheme="file" />
			</intent-filter>
		</receiver>
		<receiver android:label="K-9 Unread" android:icon="res/drawable-mdpi-v4/icon.png" android:name="com.fsck.k9.provider.UnreadWidgetProvider">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.appwidget.action.APPWIDGET_UPDATE" />
			</intent-filter>
			<meta-data android:name="android.appwidget.provider" android:resource="res/xml/unread_widget_info.xml" />
		</receiver>
		<receiver android:label="K-9 Message List" android:icon="res/drawable-xxhdpi-v4/message_list_widget_preview.png" android:name="com.fsck.k9.widget.list.MessageListWidgetProvider">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.appwidget.action.APPWIDGET_UPDATE" />
			</intent-filter>
			<meta-data android:name="android.appwidget.provider" android:resource="res/xml/message_list_widget_info.xml" />
		</receiver>
		<service android:name="com.fsck.k9.widget.list.MessageListWidgetService" android:permission="android.permission.BIND_REMOTEVIEWS" android:enabled="true" />
		<service android:name="com.fsck.k9.service.MailService" android:enabled="true" />
		<service android:name="com.fsck.k9.notification.NotificationActionService" android:enabled="true" />
		<service android:name="com.fsck.k9.service.PushService" android:enabled="true" />
		<service android:name="com.fsck.k9.service.PollService" android:enabled="true" />
		<service android:name="com.fsck.k9.service.RemoteControlService" android:permission="com.fsck.k9.permission.REMOTE_CONTROL" android:enabled="true" />
		<service android:name="com.fsck.k9.service.SleepService" android:enabled="true" />
		<service android:name="com.fsck.k9.service.DatabaseUpgradeService" android:exported="false" />
		<service android:name="com.fsck.k9.service.K9ChooserTargetService" android:permission="android.permission.BIND_CHOOSER_TARGET_SERVICE">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.service.chooser.ChooserTargetService" />
			</intent-filter>
		</service>
		<provider android:name="com.fsck.k9.provider.AttachmentProvider" android:exported="false" android:authorities="com.fsck.k9.attachmentprovider" android:grantUriPermissions="true">
			<meta-data android:name="de.cketti.safecontentresolver.ALLOW_INTERNAL_ACCESS" android:value="true" />
		</provider>
		<provider android:name="com.fsck.k9.provider.RawMessageProvider" android:exported="false" android:authorities="com.fsck.k9.rawmessageprovider">
			<meta-data android:name="de.cketti.safecontentresolver.ALLOW_INTERNAL_ACCESS" android:value="true" />
		</provider>
		<provider android:name="com.fsck.k9.provider.MessageProvider" android:readPermission="com.fsck.k9.permission.READ_MESSAGES" android:writePermission="com.fsck.k9.permission.DELETE_MESSAGES" android:exported="true" android:multiprocess="true" android:authorities="com.fsck.k9.messageprovider" android:grantUriPermissions="true" />
		<provider android:name="com.fsck.k9.provider.EmailProvider" android:exported="false" android:authorities="com.fsck.k9.provider.email" />
		<provider android:name="com.fsck.k9.provider.DecryptedFileProvider" android:exported="false" android:authorities="com.fsck.k9.decryptedfileprovider" android:grantUriPermissions="true">
			<meta-data android:name="android.support.FILE_PROVIDER_PATHS" android:resource="res/xml/decrypted_file_provider_paths.xml" />
		</provider>
		<provider android:name="com.fsck.k9.provider.AttachmentTempFileProvider" android:exported="false" android:authorities="com.fsck.k9.tempfileprovider" android:grantUriPermissions="true">
			<meta-data android:name="android.support.FILE_PROVIDER_PATHS" android:resource="res/xml/temp_file_provider_paths.xml" />
		</provider>
		<provider android:name="android.arch.lifecycle.ProcessLifecycleOwnerInitializer" android:exported="false" android:multiprocess="true" android:authorities="com.fsck.k9.lifecycle-trojan" />
	</application>
</manifest>
